Summary Eric Tee is an internet veteran with over 15 years experience in digital advertising, retail, content marketing and editorial projects. Occupying varied roles as an entrepreneur, designer, developer, product and project manager. 
 
Eric is currently a Media Development Project Manager for Yahoo Southeast Asia, responsible for launching sponsored content projects in Singapore, Malaysia, Philippines, Indonesia, Vietnam and Indonesia. 
 
Having worked in various roles throughout his career, he has a solid understanding of what makes digital initiatives work for users from a product, marketing and monetisation point-of-view. 
 
Throughout his carreer, he is known for being a collaborator and a strong team player with both colleagues and external partners. He is also an early adapter of new platforms and technologies and is sought after within teams he has been a part of for consultations and opinions. 
 
Eric is also passionate about corporate volunteerism and understanding the ability of an individual to give back to society using his/ her skill and talent. He leads CSR programmes in his company.

Experience Project Manager (Contract), Lionbridge at Microsoft Lionbridge April 2012  – Present (3 years 5 months) Dublin I am responsible for the localisation of Microsoft’s commercial packaging (Windows and Office) for EMEA and APOC regions. I work within Microsoft’s Global Art team delivering key milestones to the MS Programme Manager on budget and on schedule. My responsibilities include:  
 
-	Working closely with the product launch service team and the MS Program Manager to manage the master Parts List. This is a constant process to define, refine and maintain the list of master products and the many thousands of correct component SKUs for all markets.  
-	Developing excellent reciprocal relationships with subsidiaries and vendors I can really count on to deliver. 
-	Financial management throughout the project lifecycle. Requesting quotation from vendors, submitting POs, regular cost reviews, reporting and closeout at the end of the project. 
-	I personally carried out a pre-print QA on the final localised product. 
-	Status reporting calls to Microsoft US core development team. Project Manager Cipherion Translations May 2010  –  August 2011  (1 year 4 months) Dublin I was a Project Manager for key clients of Cipherion Traslation. I was responsible for project setup, training Junior Project Managers, status reporting to clients and COO and vendor management. Localisation Project Manager, Contracted to Microsoft (contract) Cpl Jobs Ireland May 2008  –  September 2008  (5 months) Dublin I was responsible for the Central Vendor Solutions (CVS) team as a project manager for Microsoft CRM and Business Contact Management team for 5 months contract. My responsibilities include CVS team timesheet management, localisation project management for CRM and BCM projects, reporting to Microsoft team and localisation vendor management. Project Manager Eurotext Translations October 2006  –  April 2008  (1 year 7 months) I was a localisation project manager for Eurotext’s major clients(GE, Dept of Justice, Dept of Foreign Affairs). I was responsible for project set up, status reporting to client and CEO, managing the budget for each project and also vendor management. My responsibilities were liaison with Vodafone Europe and Apple US, requirements analysis and management of content providers (Sony Music, EMI, Warner Music etc), cost management and status reporting to both the client and CEO. • Resource Capacity Planning Management, Large scale Project Portfolio Management, Project initiation, planning and requirements, work breakdown, task definition, scheduling, project control, uncertainty management, software processes and lifecycle expertise.

Summary [サマリ] 
●合計15年のウェブマーケティング経験（１９９９年１２月から） 
●カタログ通販事業者での管理会計経験約5年、マーケティング業務経験約1年、ウェブマーケティング、イーコマース業務経験約6年 
●ヤフーでのウェブマーケティング経験８年目 
●管理会計的観点と広告出稿主観点、広告媒体主的視点、イーコマース、通信販売事業者の観点を同時に備えている 
→　カタログ通販通販会社の管理会計、広告宣伝業務、マーケティング業務経験 
→　新客獲得、顧客育成、ロイヤルカスタマー化のシナリオの実務の理解、管理会計的観点からの理解をベースとしている 
→　1999年のイーコマース事業参入からサイト構築ディレクション、ユーザビリティテスト、顧客データーベースの活用、メルマガ配信、コピーライティングなど基本的なインターネット広告業務の経験を持つ 
→　直近のヤフーショッピングでのインターネット広告業務経験からアドネットワークやリターゲ×レコメンド広告など費用対効果の良いインターネット広告への出稿実績が豊富 
 
→　ヤフーでの広告出稿主業務と広告媒体主業務を同時に経験したことでの双方の視点を備える 
 
［直近詳細］ 
●ヤフーショッピング外部有料集客チーム統括（2014年9月末） 
●インターネット広告全般（スポンサードサーチ、アドワーズ 、PLA、クリテオ、デクワス、GDR、 アフィリエイト（バリューコマース））、アクセス解析（サイトカタリスト）、代理店コントロール、代理店開発、代理店コンペ、社内での予算獲得交渉、稟議起案、施策コントロール 
●総計年間数十億円規模の広告出稿コントロールを高い精度で実施しヤフーショッピングeコマース革命に貢献した 
 
●イーコマース業界、インターネット広告業界に精通 
●大規模広告費用予算を計画数値に対して高い精度で運用する体制を代理店とともに構築 
 
 
●事業へのへの貢献を優先する 
●費用対効果と取扱高インパクトに対する追及 
●部下の教育育成に対する視点を常時持つ
